definition: Keller or Köhler (name)/Horst Köhler (1943-), German economist and CDU politician, head of the IMF 2000-2004, president of Germany 2004-2010
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux
Sophocles (496-406 BC), Greek tragedian, author of Oedipus the King
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. to 貝克|贝克[bei4 ke4]
Empedocles (490-430 BC), Greek Sicilian pre-Socratic philosopher

pinyin: sheng4 Pan1 ke4 lei1 si1 zhan4

sentences.english: In fact, the first found to be a man named Henri Becquerel.
sentences.chinese: 其实，最早发现是一个名叫贝克勒尔的人。

sentences.english: Tis the god Hercules, whom Antony loved, Now leaves him.
sentences.chinese: 这是安东尼所崇拜的赫剌克勒斯，现在离开他了。
温克勒的新书名为《枪支斗争》。

sentences.english: Hu and Koehler started talks in a cordial and friendly atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛和克勒在亲切友好的气氛中开始了会谈。

sentences.english: Patroclus and Daphne hesitated, but they were hungry, too.
sentences.chinese: 普特洛克勒斯和达芙妮犹豫了，不过他们也饿了。

sentences.english: C. Kluyver to skip some lab routines and instead assist a graduate student, G.
sentences.chinese: 克勒伊弗跳过一些常规的实验内容，帮助研究生G。

sentences.english: Legend had much to say about Empedocles.
sentences.chinese: 关于恩培多克勒的传说非常之多。

sentences.english: How can you, so young, compare yourself to Herakles?
sentences.chinese: 你这么年轻怎么能和赫拉克勒斯相比？

sentences.english: Hera is using the oracle and King Eurystheus to crush Hercules.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉利用神谕以及欧律斯透斯来彻底打垮赫拉克勒斯。

sentences.english: Mr. Winkler says the bad bruise incapacitated him for two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 温克勒后来说自己的手严重受伤，两周不能自如活动。

sentences.english: Hercules knew it was Atlas, the Mountain God.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉克勒斯知道这是阿特拉斯，山神。

sentences.english: He is a Hercules in strength.
sentences.chinese: 他是个赫拉克勒斯式的大力士。
温克勒的新书名为《枪支斗争》。

sentences.english: Patroclus fell mortally wounded and died soon.
sentences.chinese: 普特洛克勒斯身受重伤倒下，不久后便死去了。

sentences.english: He's paying tribute to the Free French Forces under De-Gaulle and Leclerc.
sentences.chinese: 他在向戴高乐与雷克勒克麾下的自由法国军队致敬。

sentences.english: Eteocles, to whom the first term fell, would not relinquish his throne AT the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 先上任的厄忒俄克勒斯在年末拒绝放弃王位。

definition: rad (unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation) (loanword)
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
Pali, language of Theravad Pali canon/Barry (name)/Gareth Barry (1981-), English footballer
